title: Sex, Changing Community Standards and Decaying Denominationalism
description:
Churches that wish to uphold the inherited traditional sexual standards are under intense pressure to accommodate to the new community standards, but it's not entirely clear whether there a standard. This is threatening to destroy denominations like the Christian Reformed Church and the Reformed Church in America. In this probably too long and probably too rambling video I wander across the terrain over these issues, and some history and just think out loud about what might be coming down the road.
